text: Jiaru meiyou an la dui ni [mu sheng] de enhui he ci min, name, tamen zhong you yibufen ren bi xiang shi ni mi wu, qishi, tamen zhi neng shi tamen ziji mi wu, tamen buneng shanghai ni sihao. An la yi jiang shi ni jingdian [“gulanjing”] he zhihui, bing ba ni suo bu zhidao de jiaoshou ni. An la dui ni de enhui shi yongheng de.
